translations: v.剔去……的骨；施骨肥于；（男人）与（某人）性交；临时抱佛脚（非正式）（bone的现在分词）
n.（Boning）（美、英、德、巴、法、瑞）博宁（人名）

phrs.translation: 争论的焦点；争端的原因
骨粉（可用作动物饲料或肥料）
甲骨（中国商朝用来刻写占卜文字的龟甲兽骨）

sentences.sentence: I had spent the last few months boning up on neurology.
sentences.translation: 我前几个月都在钻研神经病学。

sentences.sentence: Make sure that you do not pierce the skin when boning the chicken thighs.
sentences.translation: 给鸡腿去骨时，确保不要刺破皮。

sentences.sentence: Tim was in a college of laws boning up on laws.
sentences.translation: 蒂姆在一所法律学校专门攻读法律。
